data.title: Barracuda announces two appointments to executive team.
data.meta_description: Free Online Library: Barracuda announces two appointments to executive team. by "M2 EquityBites (EQB)";  Business Computer software industry Executives Appointments, resignations and dismissals Software industry Vice presidents (Organizations)
data.text:
M2 EQUITYBITES-May 26, 2016-Barracuda announces two appointments to executive team

(C)2016 M2 COMMUNICATIONS http://www.m2.com

Barracuda Networks Inc (NYSE:CUDA) on Wednesday announced the appointment of Hatem Naguib as senior vice president and general manager, security business and Ezra Hookano as vice president of channels.

According to the company, these new additions will help guide Barracuda's overall strategy to support customers looking to simplify their IT security and data protection infrastructure on-premises, in the cloud and in hybrid deployments.

In his new role as SVP & GM, Security Business, Naguib has global responsibility for leading Barracuda's security product strategy to simplify security management for IT professionals.

Most recently, Naguib was vice president of networking and security at VMware. He joined VMware in 2006 and held several leadership positions there, including managing the global partnerships with Cisco, EMC and HP. He also served as the VMware executive leader for VCE, the converged infrastructure start-up founded by VMware, Cisco and EMC. Prior to VMware, he held engineering and sales leadership positions at several start-ups and global corporations including CenterRun (acquired by Sun Microsystems), GE, The Walt Disney Company and Accenture.

Also, in his new role as VP of Channels, Hookano is responsible for leading Barracuda's worldwide channel strategy. Prior to joining Barracuda, he was vice president of channels for Exablox and vice president of worldwide channels for Fusion-io. Before that, Hookano launched the business division of Drobo and earlier he spent nearly six years at Barracuda as vice president of sales, North America, growing the company from inception to over USD100m in revenues.

Barracuda is a provider of cloud-enabled solutions that empower customers to protect their networks, applications and data, regardless of where they reside.

((Comments on this story may be sent to [email protected]))
